name: Poptropica: Forgotten Islands
overview: Climb aboard your blimp and explore the vast, uncharted island chains of Poptropica. Steer clear of hazards and discover exotic islands beneath the clouds. Take to the islands and embark on quests, discovering the secrets of Poptropica's past one artifact at a time. Poptropica: Forgotten Islands is the adaptation of the most popular virtual world for kids on iPhone and iPad. Customize your avatar and travel across multiple islands, on foot or by blimp. Collect artifacts and other items and discover the mistery of the Forgotten Islands.
